title: Sea Monster Crowd Funding
desc: Sea Monster Crowdfunding is a website for the company Sea Monster Crowdfunding that displays information about the games they have funded.

title: Western Casewriters Association
desc: Western Casewriters Association (WCA) is the Western regional association of business casewriters. Its purpose is to train, develop and support business case writing for research and pedagogical purposes.

title: Learn to Code
desc: Helps you naviagate through various coding languages. You can click on the details button to learn more about the differnt languages.

title: Fun Food Drink Trivia
desc: Test your knowledge of the culinary world with these fun and fascinating food and drink trivia questions.This app allow users to enter an answer and move backwards and forwards through the list of cards

title: Harvard Museums
desc: This app allow users to discover new things by clicking through random new stuff. The web app will display one element at a time with information through API calls in a random fashion. The user can influence what they want to see next via a ban list!

title: Recipe LookUp
desc: Search for a wide variety of recipes. Users have the flexibility to set specific health score preferences and select dietary restrictions to refine their recipe choices. Also displays information graphically for healthscore, weight score & price per serving.

title: Bet Web Application
desc: Developed a dynamic forum application named Bet targeting Gen Z thrill-seekers, leveraging React and Supabase technologies. Implemented all four CRUD operations, enabling users to seamlessly create, read, update, and delete challenges, enhancing the overall user experience.

title: Crewmate Management Application
desc: Created a customizable web app to manage crewmates. User-friendly interface with form for adding, categorizing, and updating crewmates. Unique links for each crewmate and advanced functionality provided. Designed to enhance user experience.

title: Travel Diary
desc: Developed a dynamic web application allowing users to share their travel experiences through visually appealing posts, including titles, textual content, and images. Implemented a comprehensive feature set, including a user-friendly create form, a home feed displaying posts with essential details, and a detailed post page offering in-depth travel stories, images, comments, and upvote functionality.

title: Eagle Quest
desc: Designed and developed the Eagle Quest game in the GET app for Cal State LA students, aiming to enhance campus engagement. Employed a Design Thinking approach, integrating user-centered principles with game mechanics for intuitive campus exploration. Implemented features like centralized campus information, gamified participation, and real-time exploration, fostering vibrant community engagement.

title: Health Insurance Market Analysis
desc: Developed ETL Pipelines: Engineered efficient Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) pipelines using Hadoop and Hive to clean and process raw health insurance data, enhancing data quality and accessibility.

title: MiOra
desc: Our Health Projects” webpage for MiOra using HTML, CSS, and Figma, effectively showcasing health initiatives in cancer disparities, immigrant health, and men’s health awareness to increase engagement among students and funders, and support MiOra’s mission of accessible healthcare advocacy.

title: HealthBot
desc: Pioneered HealthBot project, utilizing advanced conversational AI to revolutionize healthcare interactions. Orchestrated seamless SAP integration, ensuring robust data management for efficient health-related information handling. Engineered a user-friendly HealthBot interface, advancing healthcare communication with advanced natural language understanding.

title: Creatoverse
desc: Developed a React-based app for managing content creators' profiles using React, JavaScript, and Bootstrap. Implemented CRUD functionality to streamline profile creation, updates, and discovery, improving user experience and content management efficiency.
